import { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { useLocation, Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import Sidebar from '../components/Sidebar'; import Breadcrumb from '../components/widget/Breadcrumb'; const useFetch = () => { const [post, setPost] = useState({}); const location = useLocation(); const postId = location.pathname.split('/')[2]; const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true); const getPost = async () => { try { const result = await fetch(`/posts/${postId}`); const data = await result.json(); setPost(data); setLoading(false); } catch(err) { console.log(err) } } useEffect(() => { getPost(); },[]) return {loading, post} } function BlogSingle() { const {loading, post} = useFetch(); function createMarkup(val) { return {__html: val}; } return (

{post.title}

  • {new Date(post.created_at).toDateString()}
  • {post.comments_count} Comments
  • {post.category_id}
  • {post.tag}
